long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic Testing Application designed to diagnose and resolve issues with the auto-update feature, currently affecting another published extension called SiftScore by GrowthFactors.io. This extension replicates the operating environment of SiftScore, providing comprehensive understanding of the update process. By identifying and addressing these issues in a controlled setting, we aim to ensure seamless updates and enhanced functionality for SiftScore users.
